item.title: HackerRank Widget for WordPress
item.author: hacdias@gmail.com (Henrique Dias)
item.description: HackerRank is a competitive programming platform that started in 2012. It offers a lot of programming problems in different domains of Computer Science. Unfortunately, WordPress had no plugin to show a small version of my HackerRank profile. So Luís Soares and I have created a plugin which adds an HackerRank Widget to WordPress. The front-end This plugin makes available a plugin that shows some information about a profile of HackerRank.
